house_listing.house_description: This condominium built in 1999 has 6 bedroom(s), 6 full bath(s)/1 half bath(s) , 6 car attached garage and approximately 6700 square feet of living area. Rooms include family room. Features include private pool, air conditioning, skylights.
house_listing.firm_name: Wimbish-Riteway Re Lic. Real Estate Broker

residential_listing_-_feature_details.location: Ocean front, Bay front, Water front

house_listing.residential_listing_-_additional_feature: Foyer, Intercom System, Kitchen Island, Ocean Access, Skylights
